name: Package
desc: The configuration of a Swift package.

items.name: init(name: String, defaultLocalization: LanguageTag?, platforms: [SupportedPlatform]?, pkgConfig: String?, providers: [SystemPackageProvider]?, products: [Product], dependencies: [Package.Dependency], targets: [Target], swiftLanguageVersions: [SwiftVersion]?, cLanguageStandard: CLanguageStandard?, cxxLanguageStandard: CXXLanguageStandard?)
items.desc: Initializes a Swift package with configuration options you provide.

items.desc: The name of the Swift package.

items.desc: The default localization for resources.

items.name: var products: [Product]
items.desc: The list of products that this package vends and that clients can use.

items.desc: The object that defines a package product.

items.name: var targets: [Target]

items.desc: A target, the basic building block of a Swift package.

items.desc: The list of platforms supported by this package.

items.desc: A platform that the Swift package supports.

items.name: struct Platform
items.desc: A platform that usually corresponds to an operating system such as iOS, macOS, or Linux.

items.name: enum SystemPackageProvider
items.desc: The system package providers used in this Swift package.

items.name: var pkgConfig: String?
items.desc: The name to use for C modules.

items.name: var providers: [SystemPackageProvider]?
items.desc: An array of providers for the system target.

items.name: var dependencies: [Package.Dependency]
items.desc: The list of package dependencies.

items.desc: A package dependency of a Swift package.

items.name: enum SwiftVersion
items.desc: The version of the Swift language to use for compiling Swift sources in the package.

items.name: enum CLanguageStandard
items.desc: The supported C language standard to use for compiling C sources in the package.

items.name: enum CXXLanguageStandard
items.desc: The supported C++ language standards to use for compiling C++ sources in the package.

items.name: var swiftLanguageVersions: [SwiftVersion]?
items.desc: The list of Swift versions that this package is compatible with.

items.name: var cLanguageStandard: CLanguageStandard?
items.desc: The C language standard to use for all C targets in this package.

items.name: var cxxLanguageStandard: CXXLanguageStandard?
items.desc: The C++ language standard to use for all C++ targets in this package.
